sentence: ? NC-11: Far-right Rep. Madison Cawthorn announced Monday he'd run for re-election in the new 11th District, a seat in the western North Carolina mountains that includes most of the constituents he tried to leave behind after the Republicans passed their now-defunct congressional map in November.
title: Morning Digest: Join us for our liveblog tonight as the 2022 primaries get underway in Texas

sentence: Or, y'know, maybe someone can file the same kind of lawsuit that Madison Cawthorn has been hit with to block this seditious bigot from getting to run for any office in North Carolina, ever again.| Click Here for Full FRED Archive One Year Ago, February 21st, 2021: Mike Hubbard (AL) Two Years Ago, February 21st, 2020: Michele Presnell (NC) Three Years Ago, February 21st, 2019: Omar Navarro (CA) Four Years Ago, February 21st, 2018: Rayne Brown (NC) Five Years Ago, February 21st, 2017: Isaac Latterell (SD) 2017 Update Six Years Ago.
title: Fanatical Republican Extremist of the Day: Dan Bishop
